Sentencas: A novel molten salt method was employed to synthesize 10% Nb doped La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-delta (LSFN).
Titulo: Molten salt synthesis of Nb-doped (La, Sr) FeO3 as the oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The assynthesized powders were pure and adopted a porous structure.
Titulo: Molten salt synthesis of Nb-doped (La, Sr) FeO3 as the oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Using LSFN as the oxygen electrode for a reversible solid oxide cell, the button cell exhibited a peak power density of 0.79Wcm(-2) in H-2 and an electrolysis current density of 0.89 A cm(-2) at 1.3 V in 50% CO2/50% H-2 at 800 degrees C. A large fraction of Fe2+ was found in LSFN, resulting in the improved performance.
Titulo: Molten salt synthesis of Nb-doped (La, Sr) FeO3 as the oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Our results indicate that the molten salt method is a promising approach for the synthesis of highly active perovskite electrode with a dopant of Nb. (C) 2019
Titulo: Molten salt synthesis of Nb-doped (La, Sr) FeO3 as the oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells
Molten salt synthesis of Nb-doped (La, Sr) FeO3 as the oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells
